attributes.action: take away human rights from murderers, paedophiles and rapists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should murderers, paedophiles or rapists have any human rights. Innocent people have been brutally murdered, people have been mentally scarred by rapists and paedophiles. Many peoples lives have been ruined because of these. Don't give these criminals another chance, why do they deserve anything, their rights should be taken away as soon has they are convicted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
